verses.text: And the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, came \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w*, the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* for an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* by \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* was \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* by the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w* our \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* unto his \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.

And if they be \w married|strong="H0802"\w* to \w any|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \add other\add* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, then shall their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* be \w taken|strong="H1639"\w* from the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and shall be \w put|strong="H3254"\w* to the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* whereunto they are received: so shall it be \w taken|strong="H1639"\w* from the \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* of our \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.\f + \fr 36.3 \ft whereunto…: Heb. unto whom they shall be\f*

And when the \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall be, then shall their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* be \w put|strong="H3254"\w* unto the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* whereunto they are received: so shall their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* be taken \w away|strong="H1639"\w* from the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 36.4 \ft whereunto…: Heb. unto whom they shall be\f*

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* according to the \w word|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w* well.

This \add is\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* doth \w command|strong="H6680"\w* concerning the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let them \w marry|strong="H0802"\w* to whom they \w think|strong="H5869"\w* \w best|strong="H2896"\w*; only to the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of their \w father|strong="H0001"\w* shall they \w marry|strong="H0802"\w*.\f + \fr 36.6 \ft marry: Heb. be wives\f*

So shall not the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w remove|strong="H5437"\w* from \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* to \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*: for every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w keep|strong="H1692"\w* himself to the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 36.7 \ft keep…: Heb. cleave to the, etc\f*

And every \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, that \w possesseth|strong="H3423"\w* an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* in any \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, shall be \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* unto \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of her \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, that the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* may \w enjoy|strong="H3423"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

Neither shall the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w remove|strong="H5437"\w* from \add one\add* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* to \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*; but every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w keep|strong="H1692"\w* himself to his own \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

Even as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w*:

For \w Mahlah|strong="H4244"\w*, \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*, and \w Hoglah|strong="H2295"\w*, and \w Milcah|strong="H4435"\w*, and \w Noah|strong="H5270"\w*, the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w*, were \w married|strong="H0802"\w* unto their \w father’s|strong="H1730"\w* \w brothers’ sons|strong="H1121"\w*:

\add And\add* they were \w married|strong="H0802"\w* into the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, and their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* remained in the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of their \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 36.12 \ft into…: Heb. to some that were of the families\f*

These \add are\add* the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* and the \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* by \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \add near\add* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.
